title: Education
cleaned_text: Education Healthy Mind, Healthy Body. KNOWLEDGE IS POWER At Plaza Family Care, we believe in quality medical education. Check some of the resources below for information to maintain a healthy you. Categories General Health Tobacco Cessation Overweight/Weight Control Complimentary and Alternative Medicine Vaccines/Autism General Health - [US Dept. of Health and Human Services](https://www.healthfinder.gov/) [Cancer Information from the University of Pennsylvania](https://www.oncolink.com/) - [Disease and Drug information](https://www.medicinenet.com/) [National Institute of Health](https://health.nih.gov/) [Patient from [History of - Pediatrics](https://www.aap.org/default.htm) [Childhood - [American Academy of Pediatrics Immunization Schedule](https://www2.aap.org/family/parents/immunize.htm) - [Common Medical Issues from duPont Hosp. for Children](https://kidshealth.org/) - [AMA:MEDEM (combination of multiple medical societies)](https://www.ama-assn.org/ama) - [Centers for Disease Control and Prevention](https://www.cdc.gov/nip/scheduler_online_child.htm)
